mapper.select: SELECT todayOrder.count AS today_order_count, thisMonthOrder.count AS this_month_order_count, ROUND(((todayOrder.count - yesterdayOrder.count) / NULLIF(yesterdayOrder.count, 0)) * 100, 2) AS day_order_diff_percent, ROUND(((thisMonthOrder.count - lastMonthOrder.count) / NULLIF(lastMonthOrder.count, 0)) * 100, 2) AS month_order_diff_percent FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM orders WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()) AS todayOrder, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM orders WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS yesterdayOrder, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM orders WHERE created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < CURDATE()) AS thisMonthOrder, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM orders WHERE created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')) AS lastMonthOrder

SELECT todayMember.count AS today_member_count, thisMonthMember.count AS this_month_member_count, ROUND(((todayMember.count - yesterdayMember.count) / NULLIF(yesterdayMember.count, 0)) * 100, 2) AS day_member_diff_percent, ROUND(((thisMonthMember.count - lastMonthMember.count) / NULLIF(lastMonthMember.count, 0)) * 100, 2) AS month_member_diff_percent FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM member WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()) AS todayMember, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM member WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS yesterdayMember, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM member WHERE created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < CURDATE()) AS thisMonthMember, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM member WHERE created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')) AS lastMonthMember

SELECT p.product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.price AS product_price, b.brand_name,
COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN oi.created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND oi.created_at < CURDATE() THEN oi.quantity END), 0) AS this_month_qty,
COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN oi.created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND oi.created_at < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') THEN oi.quantity END), 0) AS last_month_qty,
CASE WHEN COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN oi.created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND oi.created_at < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') THEN oi.quantity END), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(( (COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN oi.created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND oi.created_at < CURDATE() THEN oi.quantity END), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN oi.created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND oi.created_at < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') THEN oi.quantity END), 0) ) / COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN oi.created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND oi.created_at < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') THEN oi.quantity END), 1) ) * 100, 2) END AS diff_percent FROM order_item oi JOIN product p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id JOIN brand b ON b.brand_id = oi.brand_id WHERE oi.status IN ('CONFIRMED') GROUP BY p.product_id, p.name, b.brand_name ORDER BY this_month_qty DESC LIMIT 5
